changelog:
#update #MiMiX2 #chiron

Current build date: 03/01/2019
firmware *REQUIRED* : V10.0.2.0
Minimum recovery required : TWRP 3.2.3 (Wight554's one) or latest OrangeFox (R9.0-1)

Changelog:

- CAF wifi implementation
- Fixd statusbar clock overlapping after reboot
- Development settings: allow to choose GPU renderer
- OneHand mode QS tile
- Fixed issue with go back to AOD by power button
- A/B updater: Redesign
- Other fixes and improvements

Download: Check OTA or use the direct link: https://sourceforge.net/projects/syberiaos/files/chiron/syberia_chiron-v2.3-20190301-1511-OFFICIAL.zip/download
